title: Looking for font with gym dingbats
content:
I was hoping someone might be able to suggest a dingbat font which showed weight training/ work-outs etc.   
   
I have looked everywhere I can think of, including myfonts.com, and T26. This is something I have seen previously and it's very frustrating - any help appreciated.   
   
Thanks in advance   
   
J
author: jfc

comments.content:
[http://www.virusfonts.com/downloads/olympukes.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20101203090013/http:/www.virusfonts.com/downloads/olympukes.html)   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/sports/mt/](http://web.archive.org/web/20101203090013/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/sports/mt/)   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/facts-of-life/linotypefactsoflife-one/](http://web.archive.org/web/20101203090013/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/facts-of-life/linotypefactsoflife-one/)   
 [http://www.signweb.com/design/cont/olympicpictograms.htmlhttp://www.piktogramm.com/no\_sw/en\_index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20101203090013/http:/www.signweb.com/design/cont/olympicpictograms.htmlhttp:/www.piktogramm.com/no_sw/en_index.html)   
The last two are examples of the Munich Olympic icons

Tim, thanks a lot for posting those - they are not quite what I'm looking for however, I should have given more detail;   
   
Basically I have a client who teaches physical fitness, and he instructs people on how to do exercises IE; lunges, squats, lateral raises with dumbells etc.   
   
At the moment he gives a written description to his clients of their training schedule, but what he could do with is some visual diagrams as an aid to memory.   
   
This is a font I've seen, and although it's fairly sketchy - it would meet his needs.   
   
J
John did you try a free font site like DaFonts? Did you do a Google search? Otherwise I think your Illustrator skills will be tested.

Try looking at your local computer store for clipart packages. Sometimes you can get a ton of images for really cheap, and sometimes they contain obscure things like what you're looking for.   
   
 - Lex

Thanks for the responses - I have looked at those links, but no luck. I think it might be time to get the digital camera out.   
cheers   
   
J
